of equality law under one piece of legislation. Lawyers said its impact would grow as council budgets came under pressure. Stephen Hocking, a partner at Beachcroft LLP, a commercial law firm, said: The Equality Act has profound implications for local authority decisions in relation to the delivery of public services- and the impact of the Act will only be increased by the cuts in local authority budgets over the next few years.`` The Act is making it much harder for Michael Government and local authorities to make any cuts to services and this is an increasingly precarious area for them. The judge said local authorities would be allowed to make representations to Mr Michael Gove and he would have to reconsider his decision, but that he would still have the final say in the matter. Mike Pence said the decision he and his wife will reach will be based on where can we make the most difference for the conservative principles that carried us into public service. It also comes down to where are we needed most. While Mike Pence would be one of numerous Republicans considering presidential campaigns, he would enter a race for governor as the favorite. Dallas Mayor Tom disavows` key' presentation to Michael Vick DALLAS-- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.
